Gabriel Xavier Borges - 805347

Atividade 01

a) C 1, 6 1010(2) = 001010 = 110101
b) C 1, 8 1101(2) = 00001101 = 11110010
c) C 2, 6 101001(2) = 101001 = 010110 + 1 = 010111
d) C 2, 7 101111(2) = 0101111 = 1010000 + 1 = 1010001
e) C 2, 8 110100(2) = 00110100 = 11001011 + 1 = 11001100

Atividade 02

a)C 1, 6 321(4) = 111001 = 000110
b)C 1, 8 B2(16) = 1011001 = 0100110
c)C 2, 6 231(4) = 101101 = 010010 + 1 = 010011
d)C 2, 10 146(8) = 001100110 = 0001100110 = 1110011001 + 1 = 1110011010
e)C 2, 8 6F(16) = 01101111 = 10010000 + 1 = 10010001

Atividade 03

a)1️⃣0110 = 10110 - 1 = 10101 = 01010 = 10(10)
b)1️⃣10011 = 110011 - 1 = 110010 = 001101 = 13(10)
c)1️⃣00100 = 100100 - 1 = 100001 = 011100(2)
d)1️⃣011011 = 1011011 - 1 = 1011010 = 0100101(2)
e)1️⃣110011 = 1110011 - 1 = 1110010 = 0001101 = 0D(16)

Atividade 04

a)11001(2) - 1101(2)
11001
-
01101
=
01100(2)

b)101,1101 - 10,01
101,1101
-
010,0100
=
011,1001

c)312(4) - 231(4)
312 = 110110(2)
231 = 101101(2)

110110
-
101101
=
001001

001100 = 21(4)

d)376(8) - 267(8)
376 = 011111110
267 = 010110111

011111110
-
010110111
=
001000111

001000111 = 107(8)

e)7D2 - A51
7D2 = 011111010010
A51 = 101001010001

011111010010
-
101001010001
=
-110110000001

-110110000001 = -D81


Atividade 05

a)110101 - 1011
110101
-
001011
=
101010(2)

b)101,1001(2) - 3,1(8)
3,1 = 11,001

101,1001
-
011,0010
=
010,0111

c)213(4) - 3D(16)
213 = 100111
3D = 00111101

00100111
-
00111101
=
-11101010(2)

d)C5(16) - 1011001(2)
C5 = 11000101

11000101
-
01011001
=
01101100(2)

e)7E(10) - 2D(16)
7E = 01111110
2D = 00101101

01111110
-
00101101
=
01010001(2)
